channel.title: NullPointerException
channel.description:
[code=java] java.lang.NullPointerException at ObjectClicking.objectOption1(ObjectClicking.java:107) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16386) at client.packetProcess(client.java:14010) at client.packetSending(client.java:13963) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:50) [/code]
I get that when I try use my ObjectClicking class I created. I've Google'd the NullPointerException and read about it, but I don't quite understand it. Can anyone explain it in more detail?

item.title: NullPointerException
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

java.lang.NullPointerException
        at ObjectClicking.objectOption1(ObjectClicking.java:107)
        at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16386)
        at client.packetProcess(client.java:14010)
        at client.packetSending(client.java:13963)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153)
        at server.main(server.java:50)

I get that when I try use my ObjectClicking class I created. I’ve Google’d the NullPointerException and read about it, but I don’t quite understand it. Can anyone explain it in more detail?
